DOC.brief_summary: 1. Intravitreal injection can induce perioperative stress for the patients. 2. Different factors can modulate the pre-operative fear and physiologic reaction.
DOC.brief_title: Assessment of Psychological Strain and Perioperative Fear in Intravitreal Injections
DOC.detailed_description: The aim of the study is to assess the influence of perioperative factors on objective outcome measures, which indicate the physiologic stress reaction.
DOC.criteria: First intravitreal injection received ever No known affective or mental disorder Condition does not allow standardized survey
